640 yards variations recommended small 770 - 800 yards medium 930 - 960 yards large 1180 - 1230 yards xl 1660 - 1760 yards abbreviations xxl 2200 - 2300 yards k knit  us size 8 circular knitting needles 28 - 60 in length mkr marker or size best suited for your yarn and knitting gauge p purl  tapestry needle rs right side  stitch markers - ring style st stitch sts stitches gauge* ws wrong side stockinette stitch with us size 8 needles 16 sts & 23 row = 4 *gauge after blocking though exact gauge is not essential this stitch pattern will look best with fairly tight stitches select needle size that gives the best appearance for your choice of yarn and your knitting gauge a significantly different gauge may require more or less yarn directions directions for size baby with changes for sizes small medium large xl and xxl in parentheses with us size 8 circular needles cast on 114 sts for size baby blanket small 124 sts medium 134 sts large 154 sts xl 184 sts xxl 204 sts work back and forth on long circular needles to accommodate large number of stitches work as follows for bottom border middle section and top border bottom border & set-up row row 1 3 5 7 9 11 13 15 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * across row same for all sizes row 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 ws *p1 k1 repeat from * across row same for all sizes 2 take a sunrise -
